messages.sender: will
messages.message: We want to see what docker is trying to do with port 80, since it isn’t routing it to your nginx container

messages.sender: Erick
messages.message: @cross talk - a podcast about crosswords - listen on apple podcasts or spotify also heads up for front-end stuff, the nginx setup doesn’t support hot code reloading yet I believe, so I would recommend just running webpack normally and then webapp with `make build runlocal RELOAD=true LEGACY=true` . It’ll still be on port 5000, but it’ll allow you to see changes right away until the nginx setup supports it
